docs.title: Welcome to MkDocs
docs.text: For full documentation visit mkdocs.org.

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

More information can be found at the content tab page

docs.title: Abyssal
docs.text:
Abyssal is an event that takes place in an underwater version of spawn. This is a PvP style event with more rewards the longer you survive. There is also a shrinking zone of play (created by a Minecraft World Border) that eventually will close entirely and kill everyone by 0:00 if nobody is declared winner, however there have been ways to survive in the closed border. If there are still players alive in this event when the next event is scheduled to start, it will not start, and Abyssal will continue.

Place Prize 1st Place 64 Dragon Eggs64 God Apples64 Minewind Gold Coins2x Abyssal Midas KeyFrost Master's Blade 2nd-15th Place 32 Dragon Eggs(20?) God Apples(?) 25 Minewind Gold CoinsAbyssal Midas Key 16+ Place 20 Dragon Eggs? God ApplesAbyssal Midas Key?

docs.title: History
docs.text: The first abbysal event took place on January 2, 2021.1 2

docs.title: Resources
docs.text: • https://minewind.com/abyssal/

docs.title: Footnotes
docs.text:
1. MINEWIND DISCORD first abyssal event mentions ↩

  2. First Abyssal Footage from Funeral Suits ↩

docs.title: Attack on Giant
docs.text:
Attack on Giant Event is an event that is hosted by the server throughout the day. It spawns Giant Zombies that sometimes spawn with armor. These giants blow up their surroundings and spawn Skeleton Masters and Skeleton Scouts that attack players. Although these zombies can be PvE and teamed up with, traditionally it is an event that is done solo, as other players can steal loot.

It is recommended that players keep a Dragon Egg, Ember, Key of Midas, Legendary Key of Midas, and Giant's Midas Key in their inventory, as it will quickly fill up with garbage. Allowing slots for this loot to fall into allows easy inventory management.

docs.title: Resources
docs.text: • https://minewind.com/attack-on-giant/

docs.title: Bait
docs.text:
Fishing Event is an event often referred to as Bait.

Time Span: 15 Minutes

  • Takes place in spawn
  • The most items caught wins top prize
  • Players can kill others and steal their total score
  • Players that are killed are sent back to their spawn and lose their score
  • If players leave spawn voluntarily they will lose their score
Rank Prizes 1st place -?x Dragon Eggs- 1x Jester key (rest unconfirmed) 2nd place -?x Dragon Eggs- 1x Jester Key (rest unconfirmed) 3rd place -?x Dragon Eggs- 1x Jester Key (Rest unconfirmed) 4th – 15th Place -30x Dragon Eggs- some MWGC? 16th+ 14 Dragon Eggs

docs.title: Resources
docs.text: • https://minewind.com/fishing-event/

docs.title: Events
docs.text:
There are many events on Minewind, some are seasonal and some are on a weekly basis.

There are different reasons to participate in Events. While seasonal events only reward players for farming it in a mostly uncompetetive way except for trying to snipe special event mobs for more rewards, weekly "Events" are rather competitions with loot and / or bragging rights as reward.

docs.title: Hourly Events
docs.text:
Competitive/Co-op events that are hosted randomly every hour or two. These events often reward players for participation or scoring on the leaderboard.

  • Attack on Giant
  • Fox Hunt
  • Bait
  • Abyssal
  • [[beef]]
  • [[labyrinth]]
  • [[snovasion]]

docs.title: Weekly Events
docs.text:
Are of competitive nature and hosted twice a week.

  • [[castle]]

docs.title: Seasonal Events (Depricated)
docs.text:
Based on some sort of holiday, it's Minewind's special way to celebrate. Times and dates for events are published on Minewind's website. The last of these events occurred in 2019, and none have happened since.

Seasonal Events: - Snowy Events - Valentines Day Events - Easter Events - Summer Events - Spooky Event

Related: [[event-items]]

docs.title: Specific Seasonal Events
docs.text:
• Halloween 2014 Event
  • Christmas 2016 Event
  • Valentines 2017 Event
  • Easter 2017 Event
  • Summer 2017 Event
  • Halloween 2017 Event
  • Christmas 2017 Event
  • Valentines 2018 Event
  • Easter 2018 Event
  • Summer 2018 Event
  • Halloween 2018 Event
  • Christmas 2018 Event
  • Valentines 2019 Event
  • Dragon Festival 2019 Event

docs.title: Inactive/Old Events
docs.text:
These are events of the past, and therefore awards are quite lucrative and rare.

  • Elytra Race Event

docs.title: Fox Hunt
docs.text:
Fox Hunt is an Event that takes place in the server

  • Time Span: 15 Minutes
  • Find and kill foxes around the city to get on the scoreboard.
  • Players can kill each other but players don't lose their scores
  • Foxes themselves will drop random items after killing them
  • There tend to be huge clumps of foxes that spawn randomly
  • Sometimes a boss fox will spawn, which only counts as 1 fox kill
  • A rare Fox-Chan may also spawn, which is a white fox that gives 50 points if killed.
Rank Prizes 1st place 52 Dragon Eggs1 Forbidden Cacao Beans 2nd place 42 Dragon Eggs 3rd place 32 Dragon Eggs 4th – 15th Place 22 Dragon Eggs

docs.title: Notes and tips
docs.text:
• Using elytra and projectiles to kill foxes is faster and easier than using melee.
  • Foxes will try to fight rabbit-summons, which counts as kills for the player if a rabbit kills a fox.
  • The all-time-high record score is held by Ben_2027 with 1416 fox kills in a single event.

docs.title: Resources
docs.text: • https://minewind.com/fox-hunt/

docs.title: Angry broom
docs.text: The Angry broom is a Mythical Wheat, Angry Broom and Prison Shank were given to miguel and scubasteez for an unknown reason. The two of them were wild killed, dropping the Mythicals.

docs.title: Notes
docs.text:
• This item still exists, however was blue-named by Zouran shortly after being obtained.
  • Currently owned by ChristieTwist

docs.title: Item Info
docs.text:
Title: Angry Broom

Item Type: wheat

Lore:

Sweeps bugs like flies

Enchantments:

Enchantment Level Hidden Notes sharpness 25

docs.title: Bab-ilu
docs.text: Bab-ilu is a Mythical given to KryLord for his build of [[spawn]]. Bab-ilu is a [[multipass]]/[[minibow]] that shoots a barrage of magic daggers based on the Bab-ilu of Gilgamesh's Gate of Babylon from Fate.

docs.title: Item Info
docs.text:
Title: Bab-ilu

Item Type: variable gold tool

Lore:

The things we can't obtain

are the most beautiful ones.

- Gilgamesh

Date: August 2022

Enchantments:

Enchantment Level Hidden Notes Sharpness 37 Indestructible Undroppable

Essences:

Essence Level Locked Notes Gate Of Babylon Custom essence that only exists on Bab-ilu

docs.text: No more images are available.

docs.title: Builder's Hat
docs.text: The Builder's Hat is a Mythical Turtle helmet that was awarded to SliquifierC on his build of [[spawn]].

docs.title: Notes
docs.text:
• Grants the user Creative Flight similar to the [[hermes-boots]], but also grants the user a special [[aura]].
  • The Hat has 2 Essence Slots, which the third is an unknown ability in terms of writing, because it does not show in the players /stats menu.
  • It is one of the few in game items that has an ability that isnt shown on the /stats menu.

docs.title: Item Info
docs.text:
Title: Builder's Hat

Item Type: turtle_helmet

Soul Bound: SliquifierC

Lore:

Enchanted with the lifeforce

of spectral turtle dragons.

When on Head:

  • +2 Armor

  • +10 Oxygen Bonus

  • +400% Submerged Mining Speed

When worn:

  • +1.5 Explosion Knockback Resistance

  • -150% Burning Time

Enchantments:

Enchantment Level Hidden Notes Protection 10 Respiration 10 Unbreaking 10 Projectile Protection 10 Aqua Affinity Blast Protection 10 Fire Protection 10 Soulbound Indestructible Undroppable

Essences:

Essence Level Locked Notes Unknown ability that does not show in /stats

docs.title: Devilfish
docs.text: The Devilfish was a Mythical fish. The fish seems to have granted many buffs along with its stats. It was given to CntyMcShttr for winning the first Fishing Weekend in August of 2014. It is unknown, but this item may be the first Mythical on the server, possibly beating out [[lightbringer]] and [[misery]]. This item is the first Mythical given to a specific player for an achievement.

docs.title: Notes
docs.text:
• This specific fish was caught by CntyMcShttr.
  • The first mythical to be granted to a specific player.
  • Banned in the echest of TehDrunkNChemist

docs.title: Item Info
docs.text:
Title: Devilfish

Item Type: fish

Kill Count: Unknown/Variable

Lore:

Contains the power of over 9000 fish!

Caught by: CntyMcShttr

Enchantments:

Enchantment Level Hidden Notes Sharpness 24 Was originally sharpness 10 Knockback 10 Fire Aspect 10
